tool_description: Analyzes shipping options to recommend optimal carrier and service combinations based on cost, delivery time, and reliability factors.

rate_quotes.description: Array of rate quotes from carriers

error_messages: Empty rate quotes: Provide at least one rate quote for optimization
Invalid optimization strategy: Use one of [lowest_cost, fastest_delivery, best_value, most_reliable]
Weight values error: All weight values must sum to 1.0 and be between 0 and 1
Insufficient data: Rate quotes missing required information for optimization
usage: Provide rate_quotes and optimization_strategy, optionally adjust cost_weight, speed_weight, and reliability_weight to find optimal shipping option.

cost_savings.description: Savings compared to most expensive option
